title: Add concrete service usage examples to integration guide
description:
**As a** Consoul SDK user
**I want** concrete code examples showing ConversationService, ToolService, and ModelService usage
**So that** I can quickly integrate Consoul SDK into my application

**Context:**
EPIC-012 review noted that while API reference documentation exists (docs/api/reference.md with mkdocstrings), the integration guide (docs/api/integration-guide.md) could benefit from more concrete service usage examples.

Current state:
- docs/api/reference.md: API reference via mkdocstrings (comprehensive)
- docs/api/integration-guide.md: General integration patterns (400+ lines)
- docs/development/service-layer.md: Development patterns (for contributors)
- examples/: Working examples exist but need better documentation

Users need quick-start code snippets showing common patterns.

**Technical Notes:**
- Update: docs/api/integration-guide.md
- Reference examples: examples/sdk/*, examples/fastapi_websocket_server.py
- Show usage of: ConversationService, ToolService, ModelService
- Include: FastAPI integration, custom approval providers, WebSocket patterns
- Link to: Working examples in examples/ directory

**Acceptance Criteria:**

Given I'm integrating ConversationService, when I read the integration guide, then I see a complete working example with imports, setup, and usage.

Given I need custom tool approval, when I read the integration guide, then I see examples of implementing ToolExecutionCallback protocol.

Given I'm building a web backend, when I read the integration guide, then I see FastAPI/WebSocket integration patterns.

Given I want to switch models dynamically, when I read the integration guide, then I see ModelService.switch_model() examples.

**Documentation to Add:**
- ConversationService quick start example
- Custom tool approval provider example
- FastAPI WebSocket integration example
- ModelService usage example

**Implementation Hints:**
- Add new section in docs/api/integration-guide.md after "Common Integration Patterns"
- Title: "Service Layer Quick Start"
- Include 4 subsections (ConversationService, Tool Approval, FastAPI, ModelService)
- Keep examples concise (10-20 lines each)
- Link to full examples: examples/fastapi_websocket_server.py, examples/sdk/
- Add links from API reference to integration guide examples
- Ensure all code examples are tested/working
